name: Zashiki Warashi Asako
description:
Zashiki Warashi Asako is a gameboy game about a spirit child yokai living in Murasaki Village.  Talk to villager and see if you can lend a helping hand.  You might even discover a secret or too.  Remember to save your game data in the pause menu!

Play in the browser or download the rom to play on your Gameboy!

Note: The game is currently only available in Japanese, and does not yet have music.

 

ActionKeyboard Gameboy              MoveArrow keys/  WASD D-pad Talk / InteractZ A CancelX B PauseENTER START
